name: Ninji
description:
Two ninji set out to the city to destroy the two mega-lights; extremely powerful lights that has kept the ninji away for decades. Only one problem, the ninja get very lonely without each other, so every time they go to another rooftop, they must reunite in order to continue. The ninji must also not be in the light for long, or they will be caught and captured!

Made for Mini Jam #29: Ninjas
